profile: Let's get started and build your profile
By default your username is set based on your email
But don't wory you can always change it just double click on it and pick whatever unique name you want
You can also uplode your own image
Next let's start filling our basic info
Such as birthday,  body measurements,fluid intake , activitiy and sleep qulity
And don't worry this info will only be used for creating customized plans for you
You can also include any medical issue or other info you wish to take notice of on all of your plans
Now let's go ahead and pick our first plan
viewer: Here you can view all of your current plans
Discover new plans or creat new ones
Completly on your own or let the ai surprise you
You can also create your own recipes
